item.title: About
item.description: A passionate food technologist based in Den Haag, NL, with a strong focus on quality assurance and compliance in the food industry. With experience as an Auditor and Screening Analyst at the Halal Feed and Food Inspection Authority, I’ve successfully streamlined processes and improved response times for client inquiries. My background includes teaching food technology at Universitas Bumigora and founding Lombok Market 2020, where I connected local suppliers with the community during the pandemic. I hold a Master’s degree in Food Technology from Wageningen University and am dedicated to ensuring food safety and quality.
